scripts.dev: concurrently -n shared,api,client "npm:watch -w shared" "npm run dev -w api" "npm run dev -w client"
scripts.build: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w api && npm run build -w client
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w shared && npm run typecheck -w api && npm run typecheck -w client
scripts.db:nuke: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d
